These notes contain lessons on the following topics:

* [Lesson 1](notes/lesson-1.qmd) an introduction to species distribution modelling,
* [Lesson 2](notes/lesson-2.html) using Bayesian statistical modelling,
* [Lesson 3](notes/lesson-3.qmd) machine learning for species distribution modelling, and
* [Lesson 4](notes/lesson-4.qmd) an introduction to using the Darwin system for ecosystem modelling.

The [resources](notes/resources.qmd) page contains links to data sources and relevant papers.
